name: Spy Boat Hunter Ver. 0.1
description: Hey i want to try something different with this game process i get tired of half done games that are out of tune with the gamer because not enough input is given to the most important part of the design process and that is THE GAMER of course.. So instead i'd like to try out a game while it is still in the design process to see what it needs to be a QUALITY project so give me feedback and let me know what would make this a complete game  thank you in advance.
